Description.Name: Strauss
Description.Details: The Personnel Dossier for the individual named ' Elric von Strauss ' is partially corrupted, It's unclear as to whether the full record of the person in question to have been purposely erased, removed and or scrubbed. The earliest mention of an Elric von Strauss goes back to before the fall of the first Star League, Major Elric von Strauss of the SLDF. Major Strauss was reportedly among the forces of Commanding General Aleksandr Kerensky when he liberated Terra during the Amaris Civil War. Sightings of Major Strauss ended when the vast majority of the remaining SLDF led by Aleksandr Kerensky left the Inner Sphere in what was known as Operation EXODUS.
